name: Cisco Firepower Threat Defense和Cisco FirePOWER Services存在拒绝服务漏洞
product: ["Cisco Cisco Firepower Threat Defense", "Cisco Cisco FirePOWER Services"]
description: Cisco Firepower Threat Defense（FTD）和Cisco FirePOWER Services都是美国思科（Cisco）公司的产品。Cisco Firepower Threat Defense是一套提供下一代防火墙服务的统一软件。Cisco FirePOWER Services是种综合安全解决方案，旨在增强网络安全性。Cisco Firepower Threat Defense和Cisco FirePOWER Services存在拒绝服务漏洞，该漏洞源于对TCP/IP网络流量处理不当。攻击者可利用该漏洞导致系统拒绝服务。
solution:
目前厂商已发布升级程序修复该安全问题，详情见厂商官网:
https://sec.cloudapps.cisco.com/security/center/content/CiscoSecurityAdvisory/cisco-sa-sa-ftd-snort-fw-BCJTZPMu
patch: Cisco Firepower Threat Defense和Cisco FirePOWER Services存在拒绝服务漏洞的补丁
